name: Larvesta

evolution.description: Larvesta can evolve into Volcarona at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 8 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Torch Pokémon. The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: The flames from this Pokémon's body shine dim light in a 15 ft radius. In addition, when hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker is burned.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.
